<html><div style='background-color:'><DIV>
<P>Quetzalcoatl:</P>
<P>Quetzalcoatl followed them<BR><BR></P></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>>From: "dishpanhandninja" <FOXMANROAR1@...>
<DIV></DIV>>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
<DIV></DIV>>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
<DIV></DIV>>Subject: Stand of in the ARK. 
<DIV></DIV>>Date: Sun, 18 May 2003 05:56:31 -0000 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>Standing before Scourge.... 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>"I see," Not clearly convinced. More leary of him now than before. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>"& the others with you, who are they?" she questioned coolly. 
<DIV></DIV>> FoxManRoar1 [1:29 AM]: He looked down at her his inner cooling 
<DIV></DIV>>system boiling. "They are my men, on loan, and if you must know no 
<DIV></DIV>>other decepticon could be trusted with this mission, megatron and the 
<DIV></DIV>>others would have killed prime, and the quto bots would have did like 
<DIV></DIV>>wise to megatron, if either die, i die, so i am the great equalizer." 
<DIV></DIV>> EmprzAnastazia [1:32 AM]: She somewhat cocked a brow. Though small, 
<DIV></DIV>>she was still as tall & brave as she was in the past. "That still 
<DIV></DIV>>sdoes not answer my question... Scourge," Stressing upon his name. 
<DIV></DIV>> FoxManRoar1 [1:35 AM]: "You may have seen the black cats body 
<DIV></DIV>>within, he is Mirage the blue and white bot of the qutobots, the 
<DIV></DIV>>dinosaurs are the dinobots, and their Leader/king Grimlock, and this 
<DIV></DIV>>young one is my second and most trusted in command Quetzalcoatl, and 
<DIV></DIV>>you I assume are Megatron's mistress?" 
<DIV></DIV>> EmprzAnastazia [1:38 AM]: She glanced at the others, they were 
<DIV></DIV>>indeed different from last she recalled them. Both disturbing.. yet, 
<DIV></DIV>>comforting to know others from her own generation there. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>She then looked up at Scourge, but said nothing in response to the 
<DIV></DIV>>name of "mistress".. it was so.. organic to her. However, in the 
<DIV></DIV>>past, she was something like that.. more of an equal to him... 
<DIV></DIV>>fighrting at his side or as he so ordered like a very loyal 
<DIV></DIV>>soldier... 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>> EmprzAnastazia [1:39 AM]: "I am Maxima," she glanced at Mirage & 
<DIV></DIV>>the Dinotbots, "I'm sure they are well aware of me." 
<DIV></DIV>> FoxManRoar1 [1:41 AM]: "They have no say in any of this, I am the 
<DIV></DIV>>leader, they live because i let them, they fight if i tell them, they 
<DIV></DIV>>jump if i say jump, or else." Scourge looked her over. "Megatron 
<DIV></DIV>>never mentioned you to me other then name." "Your more feminie then i 
<DIV></DIV>>thought." 
<DIV></DIV>> EmprzAnastazia [1:44 AM]: She nodded & understood. She never let 
<DIV></DIV>>feelings show. Her supposed feelings for him was clouded by deep 
<DIV></DIV>>loyalty & devotion to him & the Decepticon cause. To prove that she 
<DIV></DIV>>could be a great warrior. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>"A slight... issue & problem with this form than I would wish. That 
<DIV></DIV>>is hopefully to be changed... IF I can get a certain Maximal to 
<DIV></DIV>>recreate my old form." 
<DIV></DIV>> FoxManRoar1 [1:47 AM]: He laughed. "Why not use one of our C R 
<DIV></DIV>>Chambers?" He transformed and stood before her as the Black 18Wheeler. 
<DIV></DIV>>
